2.comment: Smith didn't exactly prove that he can be a starting quarterback in the NFL, but played somewhat well in his first start since 2007. Smith went 12-of-19 for 196 yards and 2 touchdowns (1 pass, 1 rush), though 38 of those yards came on a desperation heave that will be interceptioned 9 out of 10 times.
